 @RequestMapping(value="/api/")
public class UserController
extends java.lang.Object

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<User> getAllUsers()
      This ressource will return all the users registred in the database
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<User> getUserById(java.lang.String id)
      This ressource will return the details of a given user according to his id
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<User> registerUser(User user, java.lang.String lastName)
      This ressource will allow to add (register) new user into the database only if it respects contraints User age must be bigger than 18 User must live in France to be able to register Default parameter is defined by default for the lastName in case it's not defined if the constraints are not respected 403 forbidden status will be returned else created successfuly

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getAllUsers

        @GetMapping(value="/users")
public java.util.List<User> getAllUsers()
        This ressource will return all the users registred in the database

      • getUserById

        @GetMapping(value="/users/{id}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<User> getUserById(@PathVariable(value="id")
                                                                                                   java.lang.String id)
                                                                                            throws org.springframework.data.rest.webmvc.ResourceNotFoundException
        This ressource will return the details of a given user according to his id
        Throws:
        org.springframework.data.rest.webmvc.ResourceNotFoundException

      • registerUser

        @PostMapping(value="/register")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<User> registerUser(@RequestBody
                                                                                                   User user,
                                                                                                   @RequestParam(value="lastName",defaultValue="user")
                                                                                                   java.lang.String lastName)
                                                                                            throws org.springframework.data.rest.webmvc.ResourceNotFoundException
        This ressource will allow to add (register) new user into the database only if it respects contraints User age must be bigger than 18 User must live in France to be able to register

        Default parameter is defined by default for the lastName in case it's not defined if the constraints are not respected 403 forbidden status will be returned else created successfuly

        Throws:
        org.springframework.data.rest.webmvc.ResourceNotFoundException
